##### FILE: ns_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/web:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  labels:
    nsSelector: tenant-web
  name: web
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/web:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: web
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/web:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: web
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/web:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: web
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/web:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: web
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/pv0004:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: pv0004
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 5Gi
  mountOptions:
  - hard
  - nfsvers=4.1
  nfs:
    path: /tmp
    server: 172.17.0.2
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Recycle
  storageClassName: slow
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: github-actions
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/github-actions:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: github-actions
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/github-actions:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: github-actions
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: pod-priority-ns
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
pass: 5, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

kind: NetworkPolicy

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: no-priority-ns
spec:

  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/no-priority-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: no-priority-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/no-priority-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: no-priority-ns
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/k10-dplabel-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: k10-dplabel-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:

  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/replace-registry-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: replace-registry-ns
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/replace-registry-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: replace-registry-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/replace-registry-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: replace-registry-ns
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: replace-registry-ns

      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi

kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: onprem-proxy
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/onprem-proxy:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

  namespace: onprem-proxy
spec:

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/gatekeeper-system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gatekeeper-system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/restrict-voltypes-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: restrict-voltypes-ns
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/restrict-voltypes-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: restrict-voltypes-ns
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/restrict-voltypes-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: restrict-voltypes-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/restrict-voltypes-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: restrict-voltypes-ns
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/restrict-voltypes-ns:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: restrict-voltypes-ns
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

metadata:
  name: myapp-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: myapp
    name: myapp-container
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until nslookup myservice; do echo waiting for myservice; sleep 2; done;
    image: busybox
    name: init-myservice

---

##### FILE: nssf-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-nssf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    nf: nssf
  name: free5gc-nssf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      nf: nssf
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        nf: nssf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config/nssfcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./nssf
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.5
        name: nssf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: nssf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the UDR; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: udr-nudr:8000
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-udr
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nssf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nssf-configmap

---

##### FILE: nut.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus-nut-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-nut-exporter
  name: prometheus-nut-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus-nut-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /ups_metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9199"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus-nut-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NUT_EXPORTER_VARIABLES
          value: battery.charge,battery.voltage,battery.voltage.nominal,battery.runtime,input.voltage,input.voltage.nominal,ups.load,ups.status
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nut-config
        image: ghcr.io/druggeri/nut_exporter:3.1.3
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9199
        name: prometheus-nut-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9199
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9199
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 64m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 64m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nvidia-daemonset-preloaded.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    cloud.google.com/gke-gpu-driver-version: latest
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-gpu-driver-version
                operator: DoesNotExist
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google-containers/pause:2.0
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          echo "Checking for existing GPU driver modules"
          if lsmod | grep nvidia; then
            echo "GPU driver is already installed, the installed version may or may not be the driver version being tried to install, skipping installation"
            exit 0
          else
            echo "No GPU driver module detected, installing now"
            /cos-gpu-installer install --version=latest
          fi
        env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        - name: COS_TOOLS_DIR_HOST
          value: /var/lib/cos-tools
        - name: COS_TOOLS_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /build/cos-tools
        image: cos-nvidia-installer:fixed
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
        - mountPath: /build/cos-tools
          name: cos-tools
      - env:
        - name: LD_LIBRARY_PATH
          value: /usr/local/nvidia/lib64
        image: gcr.io/gke-release/nvidia-partition-gpu@sha256:e226275da6c45816959fe43cde907ee9a85c6a2aa8a429418a4cadef8ecdb86a
        name: partition-gpus
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /etc/nvidia
          name: nvidia-config
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/cos-tools
        name: cos-tools
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/nvidia
        name: nvidia-config
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: gpu-node

##### FILE: nvidia-device-plugin_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to gpu-node/Deployment/nvidia-device-plugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
  name: nvidia-device-plugin
  namespace: gpu-node
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FAIL_ON_INIT_ERROR
          value: "false"
        - name: DP_DISABLE_HEALTHCHECKS
          value: xids
        image: nvcr.io/nvidia/k8s-device-plugin:v0.15.0-ubi8
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nvidia-device-plugin-ctr
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
          name: device-plugin
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nvidia.com/gpu
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
        name: device-plugin

---

##### FILE: nvidia-device-plugin1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to gpu-node/Deployment/nvidia-device-plugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
  name: nvidia-device-plugin
  namespace: gpu-node
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-device-plugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FAIL_ON_INIT_ERROR
          value: "false"
        - name: DP_DISABLE_HEALTHCHECKS
          value: xids
        image: nvcr.io/nvidia/k8s-device-plugin:v0.15.0-ubi8
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nvidia-device-plugin-ctr
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
          name: device-plugin
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nvidia.com/gpu
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
        name: device-plugin

---

##### FILE: nvidia-driver-installer.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        image: gcr.io/cos-cloud/cos-gpu-installer:v2.1.9
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.8
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        image: gcr.io/cos-cloud/cos-gpu-installer:v2.0.5
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

##### FILE: nvidia-driver-installer14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.10
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        image: gcr.io/cos-cloud/cos-gpu-installer:v2.1.10
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: nvidia-driver-installer15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.10
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        image: gcr.io/cos-cloud/cos-gpu-installer:v2.1.10
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d

          privileged: true

          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-driver-installer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  name: nvidia-driver-installer
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: nvidia-driver-installer
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.9
        name: pause
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - env:
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        - name: NVIDIA_INSTALL_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /usr/local/nvidia
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_HOST
          value: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: VULKAN_ICD_DIR_CONTAINER
          value: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
        - name: ROOT_MOUNT_DIR
          value: /root
        image: gcr.io/cos-cloud/cos-gpu-installer:v2.1.9
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/nvidia
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /etc/vulkan/icd.d
          name: vulkan-icd-mount
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /root
          name: root-mount
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia/vulkan/icd.d
        name: vulkan-icd-mount
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/kubernetes/bin/nvidia
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root-mount
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

##### FILE: nvidia-gpu-driver.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/nvidia-gpu-device-plugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
  name: nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/bin/nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
        - -logtostderr
        - -host-path=/opt/nvidia-driver
        image: registry.k8s.io/nvidia-gpu-device-plugin@sha256:ebd0d26fb21ae9c7d11da156737006ceff085029c697a3a163774188c3328dbe
        name: nvidia-gpu-device-plugin
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 10Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /device-plugin
          name: device-plugin
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
      initContainers:
      - image: virtuozzo/nvidia-driver-installer:39-6.6.13-200.fc39.x86_64-550.107.02
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nvidia-driver-installer
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.15
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/nvidia-host
          name: nvidia-install-dir-host
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
      nodeSelector:
        feature.node.kubernetes.io/pci-10de.present: "true"
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
        name: device-plugin
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/nvidia-driver
        name: nvidia-install-dir-host
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: nwdaf-anlf-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-nwdaf-anlf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    nf: nwdaf
  name: free5gc-nwdaf-anlf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      name: anlf
      nf: nwdaf
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        name: anlf
        nf: nwdaf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cd /free5gc/nwdafanlf && python3 -m openapi_server
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/nwdaf-anlf:v3.0.5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nwdaf-anlf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1000Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: nwdaf-anlf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the PCF; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: pcf-npcf:8000
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-nrf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nwdaf-anlf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nwdaf-anlf-configmap

---

##### FILE: nwdaf-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nwdaf-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nwdafcfg.yaml: |
    info:
      version: 1.0.0
      description: NWDAF initial local configuration

    configuration:
      nwdafName: NWDAF # the name of this NWDAF
      sbi: # Service-based interface information
        scheme: http # the protocol for sbi (http or https)
        registerIPv4: nwdaf-nnwdaf # IP used to register to NRF
        bindingIPv4: 0.0.0.0 # IP used to bind the service
        port: 29531 # Port used to bind the service
        tls: # the local path of TLS key
          pem: config/TLS/nwdaf.pem # NWDAF TLS Certificate
          key: config/TLS/nwdaf.key # NWDAF TLS Private key
      nrfUri: http://nrf-nnrf:8000 # a valid URI of NRF
kind: ConfigMap

kind: Deployment

      nf: nwdaf

        app: free5gc
        nf: nwdaf
    spec:
      containers:

        - --config
        - config/nwdafcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./nwdaf
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.1
        name: nwdaf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 29531
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: nwdaf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the SMF; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: pcf-npcf:8000
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-nrf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nwdaf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nwdaf-configmap

    for sbi (http or https)\n    registerIPv4: mtlf-nmtlf # IP used to register to
    NRF\n    bindingIPv4: 0.0.0.0  # IP used to bind the service\n    port: 8000 #
    port used to bind the service\n\n  nrfUri: http://nrf-nnrf:8000 # a valid URI
    of NRF\n\n  networkName:  # the name of this core network\n    full: free5GC\n
    \   short: free\n  networkFeatureSupport5GS: # 5gs Network Feature Support IE,
    refer to TS 24.501\n    enable: true # append this IE in Registration accept or
    not\n    imsVoPS: 0 # IMS voice over PS session indicator (uinteger, range: 0~1)\n
    \   emc: 0 # Emergency service support indicator for 3GPP access (uinteger, range:
    0~3)\n    emf: 0 # Emergency service fallback indicator for 3GPP access (uinteger,
    range: 0~3)\n    iwkN26: 0 # Interworking without N26 interface indicator (uinteger,
    range: 0~1)\n    mpsi: 0 # MPS indicator (uinteger, range: 0~1)\n    emcN3: 0
    # Emergency service support indicator for Non-3GPP access (uinteger, range: 0~1)\n

    info\n    ReportCaller: false\n  NAS:\n    debugLevel: info\n    ReportCaller:
    false\n  FSM:\n    debugLevel: info\n    ReportCaller: false\n  NGAP:\n    debugLevel:

##### FILE: oakestra-cluster-service-manager.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-system/Deployment/cluster-netmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cluster-netmanager
  namespace: oakestra-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cluster
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cluster
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: plugin
                operator: In
                values:
                - oakestra
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MY_PORT
          value: "10110"
        - name: MQTT_BROKER_PORT
          value: "10003"
        - name: MQTT_BROKER_URL
          value: 10.108.68.155
        - name: ROOT_SERVICE_MANAGER_URL
          value: 10.100.253.57
        - name: ROOT_SERVICE_MANAGER_PORT
          value: "10099"
        - name: SYSTEM_MANAGER_URL
          value: 10.100.253.57
        - name: SYSTEM_MANAGER_PORT
          value: "10000"
        - name: CLUSTER_MONGO_URL
          value: 10.111.63.237
        - name: CLUSTER_MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: ghcr.io/jakobke/oakestra-cluster-service-manager:0.2-amd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: cluster-service-manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10110

---

##### FILE: OAuth2_prox_deploy_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oauth2-proxy/Deployment/oauth-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: oauth-proxy
  name: oauth-proxy
  namespace: oauth2-proxy
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: oauth-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: oauth-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/etc/oauth2-proxy.cfg
        image: quay.io/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy:latest
        name: oauth-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/oauth2-proxy.cfg
          name: oauth2-proxy-config
          subPath: oauth2-proxy.cfg
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: oauth2-proxy-config
        name: oauth2-proxy-config

---

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to security/ConfigMap/oauth2-proxy-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  oauth2-proxy.cfg: "# Provider config\nprovider=\"keycloak-oidc\"\nprovider_display_name=\"Keycloak\"\nlogin_url=\"https://k2s.cluster.local/keycloak/realms/demo-app/protocol/openid-connect/auth\"\nredeem_url=\"https://k2s.cluster.local/keycloak/realms/demo-app/protocol/openid-connect/token\"\nvalidate_url=\"https://k2s.cluster.local/keycloak/realms/demo-app/protocol/openid-connect/userinfo\"\nprofile_url=\"https://k2s.cluster.local/keycloak/realms/demo-app/protocol/openid-connect/userinfo\"\nssl_insecure_skip_verify=true\n#
    Client config\nclient_id=\"demo-client\"\nclient_secret=\"1f3QCCQoDQXEwU7ngw9X8kaSe1uX8EIl\"\ncookie_secret=\"ZzBkN000Wm0pQkVkKUhzMk5YPntQRUw_ME1oMTZZTy0=\"\ncookie_secure=\"false\"\n#
    Upstream config\nhttp_address=\"0.0.0.0:4180\"\nupstreams=\"file:///dev/null\"\nemail_domains=[\"*\"]\noidc_issuer_url=\"https://k2s.cluster.local/keycloak/realms/demo-app\"\nscope=\"openid\"\n#
    token\npass_access_token=true\n# Redis session store config\nsession_store_type=\"redis\"\nredis_connection_url=\"redis://redis-service:6379\"\npass_authorization_header=true\nset_authorization_header=true\n#
    The next property is needed to authenticate the bearer token \n# see https://medium.com/in-the-weeds/service-to-service-authentication-on-kubernetes-94dcb8216cdc\nskip_jwt_bearer_tokens=true\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: oauth2-proxy-config
  namespace: security

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to security/Deployment/oauth2-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: security
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/etc/oauth2-proxy.cfg
        - --set-xauthrequest
        - --pass-access-token
        - --show-debug-on-error
        - --standard-logging
        - --auth-logging
        - --request-logging
        - --ssl-upstream-insecure-skip-verify
        - --ssl-insecure-skip-verify
        image: quay.io/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy:v7.6.0
        name: oauth-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/oauth2-proxy.cfg
          name: oauth2-proxy-config
          subPath: oauth2-proxy.cfg
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - k2s.cluster.local
        ip: 172.19.1.100
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: oauth2-proxy-config
        name: oauth2-proxy-config

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to security/Deployment/redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis
  namespace: security
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --save
        - ""
        - --appendonly
        - "no"
        command:
        - redis-server
        image: redis:7.2.4
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi

---

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/oauth2-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --provider=github
        - --email-domain=*
        - --upstream=file:///dev/null
        - --http-address=0.0.0.0:4180
        env:
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_CLIENT_ID
          value: <Client ID>
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: <Client Secret>
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_COOKIE_SECRET
          value: SECRET
        image: quay.io/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oauth2-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4180
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy4_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Ingress/oauth2-proxy:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: __INGRESS_HOST__
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: oauth2-proxy
            port:
              number: 4180
        path: /oauth2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - __INGRESS_HOST__
    secretName: __INGRESS_SECRET__

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy4_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Ingress/external-auth-oauth2:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: https://$host/oauth2/start?rd=$escaped_request_uri
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: https://$host/oauth2/auth
  name: external-auth-oauth2
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: __INGRESS_HOST__
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kubernetes-dashboard
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: oauth2-proxy5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/oauth2-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --provider=google
        - --email-domain=elastisys.com
        - --upstream=file:///dev/null
        - --http-address=0.0.0.0:4180
        - --set-authorization-header
        env:
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_CLIENT_ID
          value: i-didnt-read-the-docs-above
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: i-didnt-read-the-docs-above
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_COOKIE_SECRET
          value: i-didnt-read-the-docs-above
        image: quay.io/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oauth2-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4180
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100M

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: __INGRESS_HOST__
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: oauth2-proxy
            port:
              number: 4180
        path: /oauth2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - __INGRESS_HOST__
    secretName: __INGRESS_SECRET__

##### FILE: oauth-proxy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Deployment/oauth2-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  name: oauth2-proxy
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: oauth2-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cookie-secure=false
        - --provider=oidc
        - --client-id=oidc-auth-client
        - --client-secret=secret
        - --oidc-issuer-url=https://auth.172.30.2.2.nip.io:30443/
        - --http-address=0.0.0.0:4180
        - --upstream=file:///dev/null
        - --email-domain=*
        - --set-authorization-header=true
        - --ssl-insecure-skip-verify=true
        env:
        - name: OAUTH2_PROXY_COOKIE_SECRET
          value: L01OS1ZEMUFIdTVsK3Z6dU0xa2REUT09
        image: quay.io/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: oauth2-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4180
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: oauth-proxy_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Ingress/oauth-proxy:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
  name: oauth-proxy
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: dashboard.172.30.2.2.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: oauth2-proxy
            port:
              number: 4180
        path: /oauth2
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - dashboard.172.30.2.2.nip.io
    secretName: k8s-dashboard-external-tls

---

##### FILE: oauth-proxy_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-dashboard/Ingress/k8s-dashboard-external-auth2:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-response-headers: authorization
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: https://$host:30443/oauth2/start?rd=$escaped_request_uri
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: https://$host:30443/oauth2/auth
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
  name: k8s-dashboard-external-auth2
  namespace: kubernetes-dashboard
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: dashboard.172.30.2.2.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kubernetes-dashboard
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: octant_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to octant/ClusterRole/octant-readonly-everything:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  annotations:
    rbac.authorization.kubernetes.io/autoupdate: "true"
  labels:
    app: octant
  name: octant-readonly-everything
  namespace: octant
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - '*'
  resources:
  - '*'
  verbs:
  - '*'

---

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding

    app: octant
  name: octant-role-binding
  namespace: octant
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: octant-readonly-everything
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: octant-readonly-sa
  namespace: octant

##### FILE: octant_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to octant/Service/octant-dashboard:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: octant-0.24.0
  name: octant-dashboard
  namespace: octant
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 8000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: http
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: octant-dashboard
    app.kubernetes.io/name: octant
  type: ClusterIP

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: octant_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to octant/Deployment/octant-dashboard:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: octant-dashboard
  namespace: octant
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: octant-dashboard
      app.kubernetes.io/name: octant
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: octant-dashboard
        app.kubernetes.io/name: octant
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OCTANT_HTTP_PORT
          value: "8000"
        - name: OCTANT_PLUGINS_DIR
          value: /home/octant/.config/octant/plugins/
        - name: OCTANT_PLUGINS_LIST
          value: ""
        image: aleveille/octant-dashboard:v0.25.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        name: octant
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-mount
        - mountPath: /home/octant/.config/octant/plugins/
          name: plugins-mount
      initContainers: null
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
      serviceAccountName: octant-readonly-sa
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-mount
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: plugins-mount

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource octant/Deployment/octant-dashboard
policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource octant/Deployment/octant-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-requests-limits -> resource octant/Deployment/octant-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource octant/Deployment/octant-dashboard failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/


pass: 13, fail: 3, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

##### FILE: odoo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/odoo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: odoo
  name: odoo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: odoo
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: odoo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ODOO_DATABASE_NAME
          value: k8smaestro
        - name: ODOO_DATABASE_PASSWORD
          value: k8smaestro
        - name: ODOO_DATABASE_USER
          value: odoo
        - name: ODOO_DATABASE_HOST
          value: postgresql.odoo.svc.cluster.local
        - name: ODOO_DATABASE_PORT_NUMBER
          value: "5432"
        image: docker.io/bitnami/odoo:16
        name: odoo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8069
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/odoo
          name: odoo-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: odoo-data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/offers-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: offers-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: offers-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: offers-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: offers-service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: offers-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8084
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: log-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: log-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: log-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: ogcapi_editor_role.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/ogcapi-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ogcapi-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ogcapi-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ogcapi-operator
  name: ogcapi-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - pdok.nl
  resources:
  - ogcapis
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - pdok.nl
  resources:
  - ogcapis/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx

    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3

  namespace: ingress-nginx

      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.ingress-nginx.svc
        - --namespace=ingress-nginx
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        image: jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=ingress-nginx
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        image: jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: null
        name: patch
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=ingress-nginx/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=ingress-nginx/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.32.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.ingress-nginx.svc
        - --namespace=ingress-nginx

        image: jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx

  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=ingress-nginx
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        image: jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: null
        name: patch
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.32.0
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-2.0.3
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=ingress-nginx/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=ingress-nginx/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.32.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.41.2
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-3.10.1

      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: docker.io/jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.5.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission
