policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.41.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-3.10.1
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.41.2
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-3.10.1
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: docker.io/jettech/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.5.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.41.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-3.10.1
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v0.41.2@sha256:1f4f402b9c14f3ae92b11ada1dfe9893a88f0faeb0b2f4b903e2c67a0c3bf0de
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/bye-world-namespace:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: bye-world-namespace
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/bye-world-namespace:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: bye-world-namespace
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/bye-world-namespace:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: bye-world-namespace
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

  - Egress

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/bye-world-namespace:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: bye-world-namespace
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

##### FILE: ollama_gpu_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ollama/Deployment/ollama:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ollama
  namespace: ollama
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: ollama
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: 8445
        prometheus.io/scrape: true
      labels:
        name: ollama
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PATH
          value: /usr/local/nvidia/bin:/usr/local/cuda/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
        - name: LD_LIBRARY_PATH
          value: /usr/local/nvidia/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64
        - name: NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES
          value: compute,utility
        image: ollama-metrics:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: ollama
        ports:
        - containerPort: 11434
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8445
          name: monitoring
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nvidia.com/gpu
        operator: Exists

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource ollama/Deployment/ollama failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ollama:

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: ollama
  name: ollama
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ollama
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: ollama
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ollama/ollama:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: ollama
        ports:
        - containerPort: 11434
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: code
        - mountPath: /root/.ollama
          name: ollama
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: ubuntu3070ti
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /ollama
        name: code
      - hostPath:
          path: /ollama/ollama
        name: ollama

##### FILE: ollama-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ollama:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ollama
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: ollama
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: ollama
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: name
                operator: In
                values:
                - ollama
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: ollama/ollama:latest
        name: ollama
        ports:
        - containerPort: 11434
          name: http
          protocol: TCP

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ollama:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.network/net: "true"
    io.kompose.service: ollama
  name: ollama
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: ollama
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: ollama
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ollama/ollama:latest
        name: ollama
        ports:
        - containerPort: 11434
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 200Mi
        tty: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: ollama-claim0
        - mountPath: /root/.ollama
          name: ollama-claim1
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: ollama-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ollama-claim0
      - name: ollama-claim1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ollama-claim1
status: {}

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: olm

  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/operators:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: operators
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: olm_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/olm-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: olm-operator
  name: olm-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: olm-operator
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: olm-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace
        - $(OPERATOR_NAMESPACE)
        - --writeStatusName
        - ""
        command:
        - /bin/olm
        env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: olm-operator
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:e74b2ac57963c7f3ba19122a8c31c9f2a0deb3c0c5cac9e5323ccffd0ca198ed
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        name: olm-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 160Mi
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

---

##### FILE: olm_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/catalog-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: catalog-operator
  name: catalog-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: catalog-operator
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: catalog-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -namespace
        - olm
        - -configmapServerImage=quay.io/operator-framework/configmap-operator-registry:latest
        - -util-image
        - quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:e74b2ac57963c7f3ba19122a8c31c9f2a0deb3c0c5cac9e5323ccffd0ca198ed
        command:
        - /bin/catalog
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:e74b2ac57963c7f3ba19122a8c31c9f2a0deb3c0c5cac9e5323ccffd0ca198ed
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        name: catalog-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 80Mi
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

---

        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP

            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        resources:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/catalog-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: catalog-operator
  name: catalog-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: catalog-operator
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: catalog-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -namespace
        - olm
        - -configmapServerImage=quay.io/operator-framework/configmap-operator-registry:latest
        - -util-image
        - quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:e74b2ac57963c7f3ba19122a8c31c9f2a0deb3c0c5cac9e5323ccffd0ca198ed
        command:
        - /bin/catalog
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:e74b2ac57963c7f3ba19122a8c31c9f2a0deb3c0c5cac9e5323ccffd0ca198ed
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        name: catalog-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 80Mi
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

kind: NetworkPolicy

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns

##### FILE: olm2_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/olm-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: olm-operator
  name: olm-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: olm-operator
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: olm-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace
        - $(OPERATOR_NAMESPACE)
        - --writeStatusName
        - ""
        command:
        - /bin/olm
        env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: olm-operator
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:1b6002156f568d722c29138575733591037c24b4bfabc67946f268ce4752c3e6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        name: olm-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 160Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

---

##### FILE: olm3_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/olm-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: olm-operator
  name: olm-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: olm-operator
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: olm-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace
        - $(OPERATOR_NAMESPACE)
        - --writeStatusName
        - ""
        command:
        - /bin/olm
        env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: olm-operator
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:f41fcb25b37a6f280b5929f419b393141f0d72edcafe3b98232fc8af4e8a8139
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        name: olm-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 160Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to olm/Deployment/catalog-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: catalog-operator
  name: catalog-operator
  namespace: olm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: catalog-operator
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: catalog-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --namespace
        - olm
        - --configmapServerImage=quay.io/operator-framework/configmap-operator-registry:latest
        - --opmImage=quay.io/operator-framework/opm@sha256:3bbabf4be41d2d071ce5dd2fe35040139848331c95dfb23ff06f5ba47fd13203
        - --util-image
        - quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:f41fcb25b37a6f280b5929f419b393141f0d72edcafe3b98232fc8af4e8a8139
        - --set-workload-user-id=true
        command:
        - /bin/catalog
        image: quay.io/operator-framework/olm@sha256:f41fcb25b37a6f280b5929f419b393141f0d72edcafe3b98232fc8af4e8a8139
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        name: catalog-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 80Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: olm-operator-serviceaccount

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/omada-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: omada-controller
  name: omada-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: omada-controller
  serviceName: omada-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: omada-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MANAGE_HTTP_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: MANAGE_HTTPS_PORT
          value: "443"
        - name: PORTAL_HTTP_PORT
          value: "8088"
        - name: PORTAL_HTTPS_PORT
          value: "8843"
        - name: PORT_APP_DISCOVERY
          value: "27001"
        - name: PORT_DISCOVERY
          value: "29810"
        - name: PORT_MANAGER_V2
          value: "29814"
        - name: PORT_TRANSFER_V2
          value: "29815"
        - name: PORT_RTTY
          value: "29816"
        image: mbentley/omada-controller
        name: omada-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: manage-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8843
          name: portal-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 27001
          name: app-discovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 29810
          name: discovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 29814
          name: manager
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29815
          name: transfer
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29816
          name: rtty
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/logs
          name: logs
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: "0"
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - apiVersion: v1
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    metadata:
      name: data
      namespace: omada-controller
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 8Gi
      storageClassName: freenas-api-iscsi-csi
  - apiVersion: v1
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    metadata:
      name: logs
      namespace: omada-controller
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 8Gi
      storageClassName: freenas-api-iscsi-csi

##### FILE: oms-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oms/Ingress/oms-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: oms-ingress
  namespace: oms
spec:
  rules:
  - host: ae73adf0061dc4d49ab515bf812150d9-1090975536.eu-central-1.elb.amazonaws.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: oms-client-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /oms(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
      - backend:
          service:
            name: oms-server-service
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /oms/api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ondevice
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ondevice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ondevice
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - cd /app && python3 ondevice_deploy.py
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: tango_ondevice_deploy
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: tango-ondevice
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8891
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2048Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tango
          name: ondevicevol
      nodeName: etri-1
      volumes:
      - name: ondevicevol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvcnfs-shared

---

##### FILE: onepage.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to onepage/Deployment/onepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: onepage
  name: onepage
  namespace: onepage
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: onepage
      k8s-app: onepage
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: onepage
        k8s-app: onepage
      name: onepage
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.digitalocean.com/unmutedtech/onepage:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: onepage
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: dir
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - cp
        - -r
        - /var/www/.
        - /code
        image: busybox
        name: install
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /code
        name: dir

---

  clusterIP: 10.245.172.201
  clusterIPs:
  - 10.245.172.201

  - IPv4
